alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 8:39PM CDT until April 16 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Hawley. * WHEN...From Monday evening to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Parts of Hawley City Park begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday evening to a crest of 8.2 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
